attributes.action: Recognize the bravery of John Smeaton and put his name forward to The Sovereign for approval to be awared The George Cross
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The bravery of John Smeaton on the 30th June 2007 is Unquestionable the fact that he put his life on the line to stop a terrorist to save the life of other should be recognized by the goverment and he should be awared the George Cross for this.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
